GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.4.162
GSD.description:
perf bench futex: Fix memory leak of perf_cpu_map__new()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.162 by commit 9e0df711f8dbe5650ad4f557c12a5cb302432a37, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 9c3516d1b850ea938b074df33e4c86d721c77720. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: perf bench futex: Fix memory leak of perf_cpu_map__new()
